article_title: NBA's Magic Johnson, Alonzo Mourning Latest Celebs To Promote ObamaCare

article_metadata.description: VideoThe Obama administration, in its latest push to increase the number of Americans signing up to enroll in health benefits under the Affordable Care Act, said NBA legends Magic Johnson and Alonzo Mourning who are well familar with using the medical care system will appear in ads beginning tonight. The ads [...]
